key.name: pinned-apps
key.summary: the apps which have been pinned to the dock
key.description: A string array containing the names of the apps which have been pinned to the dock.

key.name: indicator-type
key.summary: The type of indicator (e.g light, dark or none)
key.description: The type of indicator (e.g. light or dark, or no indicator) which is displayed next to running apps.

key.name: multi-ind
key.summary: Whether to display an indicator for each open window
key.description: Whether to display an indicator for each open window (maximum 4) that an application has.

key.name: apps-from-all-workspaces
key.summary: Whether to show unpinned apps from all workspaces
key.description: Whether to show running unpinned apps from all workspaces

key.name: win-from-cur-workspace-only
key.summary: Whether to show indicators and window list items for the current workspace only
key.description: Whether to show indicators and window list items only for apps which have windows open on the current workspace

key.name: use-win-list
key.summary: Whether or not to use the applet's window list, or Compiz thumbnail previews
key.description: Sets whether or to switch between an app's open windows using either the applet's built in window list, of Compiz window previews

key.name: panel-act-list
key.summary: Whether to show an app's action list on the panel right click menu.
key.description: Whether to an apps action list on the panel right click menu. If set to false, the applet's built in action list popup will be used

key.name: first-run
key.summary: Whether this is the first time the applet has been run
key.description: Whether this is the first time this particular instance of the applet has been run

key.name: click-restore-last-active
key.summary: Specifies what to do when a running app's dock icon is click
key.description: If set to true, the app's last running window is made active again. If false all of the app's windows are restored/unminimizes and the last active window is made active again

key.name: change-panel-color
key.summary: Specifies whether MATE panels are to change colour according to the desktop wallpaper
key.description: If set to true, the colour of the MATE panel will change whenever the desktop wallpaper is changed, and will be set to the dominant colour of the wallpaper image

key.name: change-panel-color-dock-only
key.summary: When changing MATE panel colours, specfies whether or not all panels are to changed
key.description: If set to false, the colour of all MATE panels are changed. If set to true only the color of the panel containing the dock will be changed will be set to the dominant colour of the wallpaper image

key.name: bg-type
key.summary: The type of active icon background (e.g gradient or solid fill)
key.description: The type of icon background (e.g. gradient or solid fill) which is displayed under the active app.

key.name: fallback-bar-col
key.summary: The rgb elements of the fallback color of bar and other types of indicators
key.description: A colour to be when drawing bar and other types of indicators and the highlight colour of the current theme cannot be determind. Mainly intended for use with Gtk2.

key.name: app-spacing
key.summary: The amount of space between app icons in the dock
key.description: The amount of space between app icons in the dock - valid values 0 - 8

key.name: attention-type
key.summary: Defines how a dock icon reacts when an app requires attention
key.description: Defines how a dock icon reacts when an app requires attention e.g. blink

key.name: popup-delay
key.summary: The delay before a popup window appears
key.description: The delay (in milliseconds) before an action list or window list appears when the mouse hovers over a docked app

key.name: saved-configs
key.summary: The pinned app configurations defined for each workspace
key.description: Each item in the list is a csv string containing the config name, the name of the workspace that the config will automatically be selected for, followed by .desktop filenames representing the pinned apps

key.name: pinned-apps-on-all-workspaces
key.summary: Whether pinned apps appear on all workspaces, or only on the workspace where they were pinned
key.description: If true, pinned apps appear on all workspaces. If false, whenever a new workspace is made active the corresponding pinned app configuration will be loaded

key.name: dock-fixed-size
key.summary: Indicates whether or not the dock should be a fixed size
key.description: Speicifies the maximum number of app icons the can contain. If this is number is exceeded the dock not expand will instead allow the user to scroll app icons. A value of -1 indicates the dock is not a fixed size and will expand and contract and apps are open and closed

key.name: click-action
key.summary: Defines what to do when a running app's dock icon is clicked
key.description: 0 = display the app's window list, 1 = show compiz window spread, 2 = minimize/restore all app's windows. Note: the use-win-list key is now deprecated.

key.name: theme
key.summary: Specifies the theme used by the dock (e.g. Unity, Subway, Default).
key.description: Sets the indicator type and icon background used by the dock. If theme is set to 'Custom' these can be individually specified.
